mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.class_name AS className, c.leader_name AS leaderName, g.grade_name AS gradeName FROM base_class c INNER JOIN base_grade g ON c.grade_id = g.id WHERE c.id = #{classId}
mapper.update: UPDATE `base_class` SET class_name = #{ew.className}, leader_name = #{ew.leaderName}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{ew.classId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT c.id AS classId, c.period, c.class_name AS className, CASE WHEN ur.user_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isSelect FROM base_class c LEFT JOIN base_con_class_user ur ON c.id = ur.class_id AND ur.user_id = #{userId} where c.period = #{period} ORDER BY c.period DESC
